review: Got my firestick with remote. Love it. Easy to hook up and install.
author: Michael Louis Marinaro

review: The fire stick offers more than what I expected.  It streams beautifully.  And I love the screen saver pictures.We could get ri of our cable and be totally entertained with the fire stick.
author: Carma Hilliard

review: Works great!!!  We love it.  I wish I would of bought one sooner.  I wish the remote was a little bigger but it's manageable.
author: April

review: I was incredibly pleased with the new Fire Stick...then Amazon started charging to watch old tv sitcoms.
author: Lisa Liberi McGarvey

review: We love the convenience of the fire stick!
author: Tara Trigg

review: I love the fire stick.  It offers more than I ever dreamed it would.
author: JAN W. QUICK

review: This was way more than I was hoping for.  I have a Chromecast which was nice for what it is.  However, the fire stick blows it out of the water.  The Chromecast has since been put back in the box.
author: Jeffery

review: does what I wanted , so very happy with it
author: daniel holley
